Title: Dalek
Plot:
Location: Utah, Earth
Date: 2012
Enemy: Dalek

The Doctor and Rose find themselves in an underground museum in Utah in the year 2012. The museum houses all kinds of extra-terrestrial artefacts the only living exhibit being one of the Doctor's oldest enemies - a Dalek. But soon after, it escapes from its "torture chamber," and goes on a killing spree. Will Rose be one of the victims?
GuestStars: Nicholas Briggs, Joe Montana, Jana Carpenter, John Schwab, Nigel Whitmey, Bruno Langley, Anna-Louise Plowman, Corey Johnson, Steven Beckingham, Barnaby Edwards
